name: Cipher Patrol 2
overview: Eleanor Burns and TND games is very proud to present Cipher Patrol 2 - The Pure Sword. This is a Strider inspired game that was originally made using the Shoot Em Up Construction Kit, but has been fully transformed into a proper platform action arcade action adventure with thanks to Eleanor's additional code. The game also features a brand new front end, new score panel and atmospheric music by TND games.
